import { Link } from "react-router-dom" function TeamForm(props) { const teamsForm = props.matchData?.content?.matchFacts?.teamForm console.log(teamsForm) return (
Teams Form
{teamsForm?.map((matches, index) => (
{matches?.map((match, index) => (
{match?.home?.name}
{match?.score}
{match?.away?.name}
))}
))}
) } export default TeamForm
